statements: UPDATE interactions_on_social_media SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions_on_social_media SET platform_name = 'Twitter', customer_id = 5 WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
UPDATE interactions_on_social_media SET interaction_content = 'New Content Example' WHERE interaction_id = 1
UPDATE interactions_on_social_media SET interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-01 16:30:25' , interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE customer_id = 5
UPDATE social_media_posts SET likes_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.75, sentiment_category = 'positive' WHERE analysis_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_content='Updated post content', likes_count=10 WHERE post_id=1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score=0.75, analysis_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE analysis_id=2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 4.5 WHERE sentiment_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'example1@email.com', social_media_handle = 'example1_handle' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 4.5, sentiment_category = 'positive' WHERE sentiment_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET platform='Twitter', interaction_type='Tweet' WHERE customer_id=123;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score=0.85, sentiment_category='Positive' WHERE customer_id=456;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_text = 'Great experience!' WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 9.5, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE sentiment_id = 456
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_content = 'This is an updated post content.', post_date = '2023-05-10' WHERE post_id = 3;
